title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-2.3 - Time requirements for compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-2.3 - Time requirements for compliance

State Regulations

No institution shall permit any student to attend such institution in excess of 30 days without complying with section
66-2.2
of this Subpart, except that for a student from out of state or another country who can show a good faith effort to comply with section
66-2.2
of this Subpart may attend the institution for 45 days. Prior to August 1, 1991, the applicable 30- and 45-day periods shall be extended to 60 and 90 days, respectively. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
66-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
